page.title: 13Public Transport
page.content: {Trains:-}The Main line from Portsmouth to Waterloo (London) runs north to south through the area. There is a station at Rowlands Castle and slow, and semi-fast Trains stop. The line is electrified and the trains are 12 or 4 coach sets. {Buses:-}Southern Motorways, a small bus company based at Emsworth, runs 5 buses a day in each direction between Horndean and Havant through Rowlands Castle, no Sunday service. Portsmouth City Transport buses serve Sharp's Copse. They run through Leigh Park and Havant to Portsmouth and Southsea on four routes. Southdown Motor Sevices (part of the National Bus Company) runs the service from Westbourne to Havant Bus Station and on to Fareham approximately one bus an hour in each direction runs during the week.
